casebody.data:
State
v.
Tae Kwon Hammonds 389A15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 29, 2016 Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hammonds, Tae Kwon. Joseph E. Elder, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. John R. Rittelmeyer, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Anne Bleyman, Attorney at Law, for Disability Rights North Carolina, et al.

Trey Robison, District Attorney.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Supplemental Brief filed on the 28th of December 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of December 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 3rd day of February 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
